title: Iran regime balance between Islam and secular

content.question: Which of the following is a core principle of the present-day Islamist regime in Iran?

choices.label: Promotion of social justice through class struggle
Violent conflict with the West to promote religious conversions
Closer connection of Islam with its pre-Islamic Persian identity
Accommodation of Islam to a constitutional framework
Nonmembership in the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) because of non-Muslim OPEC members

content.answer: Accommodation of Islam to a constitutional framework

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
